summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Lawvek B2B SaaS website bug fixes. Both bugs (EarlyAccessModal positioning and IntegrationsSection icon cutoff) have been fixed and verified. All features work correctly.
passed_tests: Header 'Get Priority Access' button displays correctly and opens modal
Header 'Watch Demo' link displays correctly
Hero section 'Get Priority Access' button displays correctly and opens modal
Hero section 'Watch Demo' button displays correctly
EarlyAccessModal opens correctly from Header CTA
EarlyAccessModal opens correctly from Hero CTA
EarlyAccessModal opens correctly from CTA Section
EarlyAccessModal is centered on screen (fixed from bottom-left positioning bug)
EarlyAccessModal name field is fillable
EarlyAccessModal email field is fillable
EarlyAccessModal company size dropdown works
EarlyAccessModal subscribe checkbox is clickable
EarlyAccessModal close button (X) works correctly
EarlyAccessModal form submission shows success message 'You're on the list!'
EarlyAccessModal success state close button works
IntegrationsSection displays correctly with title 'We live in your workflow'
IntegrationsSection shows all 9 integration icons: Slack, Gmail, Microsoft Teams, Ironclad, SpotDraft, Google Docs, Microsoft Word, Outlook, DocuSign (fixed cutoff issue)
IntegrationsSection central hub (L logo) visible
IntegrationsSection connecting lines visible (9 SVG paths)
IntegrationsSection animated dots working
CTA Section 'Get Priority Access' button displays correctly and opens modal
CTA Section 'Watch Demo' button displays correctly
Comparison Section visible with 'Lawvek vs Traditional Law Firm' title
Mobile responsiveness - hamburger menu toggle visible
Mobile menu opens correctly with 'Get Priority Access' button
context_for_next_testing_agent: All bugs reported in previous iterations have been fixed: 1) EarlyAccessModal is now properly centered using flex container instead of being positioned at bottom-left. 2) IntegrationsSection container height increased to 450px to prevent SpotDraft and DocuSign icons from being cut off. All integration icons (9 total) are now visible. Form submission flow tested and working correctly with success state.
